stories.title: Sample Article: Expert Weighs In on Police Body Camera Technology
stories.summary: Dr. Ian Adams, a criminologist at the University of South Carolina, discussed the impact of body-worn cameras on police accountability...
stories.snippet: "Body cameras have transformed how we study police interactions," said Dr. Ian Adams, assistant professor of criminology at USC.

stories.title: New Research Examines AI in Police Report Writing
stories.summary: A study by researchers including Ian Adams explores how artificial intelligence is changing how police officers document incidents.
stories.snippet: The study, co-authored by Ian Adams of the University of South Carolina, found significant variations in how AI tools are being deployed...

stories.title: Understanding Use of Force: Expert Analysis
stories.summary: Policing experts weigh in on recent use of force incidents and what data reveals about officer decision-making.
stories.snippet: Adams, a policing researcher, noted that the data shows complex patterns in how officers respond to various situations.
